meanings.definition: The state of being disreputable or lacking a good reputation.
meanings.sent1: His disreputability in the community made it hard for him to find a job.
meanings.sent2: The disreputability of the company's practices led to a decline in sales.
meanings.sent3: Despite his disreputability, he always managed to charm his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The disreputability of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over them.
meanings.sent5: The disreputability of the rumor spread like wildfire through the small town.

meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being disreputable.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't ignore the disreputability of his actions any longer.
meanings.sent2: The disreputability of the product was evident in its poor reviews.
meanings.sent3: The disreputability of the situation was so absurd, it almost seemed comical.
meanings.sent4: His disreputability was a stain on the otherwise pristine reputation of the company.
meanings.sent5: The disreputability of the old building added to its mysterious allure.
